about_the_game:
Chapter 1 - is a free chapter of Enelia: Dawn of Madness.

If you'd like to continue your journey we're planning to release it episodically ou our Early Access page!

Wishlist Chapter 2 on Steam





Enelia has dreamed of becoming a druid since childhood. In order to fulfill her dream she must defy the established Za'ani traditions. On the way to her goal, she learns a terrible secret that jeopardizes not only her own but also lives of her loved ones.

Game features
- Use Astral Vision to see what no one does.
- Make fateful choices and shape your own path.
- Build relationships with characters and creatures.
- Solve adventure style puzzles and mysteries.
- Collect lore in your diary.
- Reveal the truth about Madness.



In search of salvation, Enelia ventures into an uncharted world with unique natural phenomenas, mythical creatures, ancient secrets, and members of a dark cult. You will embark on a dangerous and mysterious journeywith Enelia and her pet Shio in order to gain the power of a druid and find cure for a mythical disease called madness.



During the path you will explore wonderous landscapes, meet various characters, make fateful choices, reveal ancient sanctuaries, uncover world secrets and solve puzzles.

Our inspirations include Avatar, Princess Mononoke, LOTR, World of Warcraft, One Piece, Jujutsu Kaisen and many other!

short_description: Delve into the heart of darkness with Enelia, a chilling horror visual novel set in an Avatar-inspired biopunk realm. It's a dramatic story about adventure, love and fate.
